metadata.title: Brick Quest - AI-Powered LEGO Builder & 3D Instructions
metadata.description: Scan your LEGO bricks with AI, build a digital inventory, and get step-by-step 3D building instructions. Works with any brick brand.

hero.subtitle: Unleash the hidden potential of your brick collection section. Scan your loose parts and let our AI guide you on a building adventure.

build.title: AI Blueprint Generation
build.description: Choose your destiny. The AI generates custom, step-by-step 3D building instructions based on what you own.

view.title: Interactive Construction

1.q: Does it work with non-LEGO brands?
1.a: Yes! Our AI can identify most standard brick types regardless of the brand.

2.q: Is the app free to use?
2.a: You can get started for free. Premium features like unlimited scans and advanced models are available with a subscription.

3.q: Can I save my digital inventory?
3.a: Absolutely. Your brick collection is saved to your profile so you can build anytime.
